dca_creation_amount.description: Amount in native coins for creation dca task and refill amount

refill_threshold.description: Task balance threshold to trigger refill, put it at zero if you consider to never refill your tasks

BaseInstantiateMsg.description: Used by Module Factory to instantiate App

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
